objects.text:
• Kitty Tower Playset with 9 Pieces
• Includes 2 Adorable Cats
• Spinning Palm Tree & Hammock
• Food & Toy Accessories

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This vibrant and playful square banner is divided into four quadrants, each featuring a unique pastel background: hot pink (top left), pale pink (top right), light green (bottom left), and lavender (bottom right). At the center of the banner lies a product image of a colorful pet playset featuring toy cats and a mini environment. The top left quadrant contains two prominent white text layers — one bold header ("heading") and a smaller subheader ("subheading") — emphasizing the brand and product theme. The bottom left area features a four-line bulleted product description ("description"), a large, eye-catching price ("price") in dark font, and a rounded rectangular pink call-to-action button ("cta_button") containing white button text ("cta"). Subtle decorative white lines, waves, dots, and circles further enhance the fun, kid-friendly aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Hot Pink: #FF69B4
- Pale Pink: #FFC0CB
- Light Green: #98FB98
- Lavender: #D8BFD8
- White: #FFFFFF
- Charcoal/Dark Gray: #333333
product_color: The product image features a playful and vibrant color palette that accentuates the toy’s cheerful and fun nature. Dominant colors include bubblegum pink (#EF4C9C) in the upper house structure, grass green (#3AC283) for foliage and leaf details, and sand beige (#F1C59A) on the base and pillars. Bright purple (#A974D1) accents the paw sign and turtle figure, while sky blue (#48C3E2) and pastel lavender (#DCAEF3) highlight the food bowls and hammock. The toy animals are rendered in natural yet soft shades like warm brown (#B56B3F) and snowy white (#F7F7F2), blending with the environment but outlined distinctly to stand out. These colors harmonize well, maintaining contrast while enhancing visual appeal for children.
